a, b = map(int, input().split())
if a <= 8 and b <= 8:
    print("Yay!")
else:
    print(":(")

n = int(input())
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

a = []

for i in range(n-1):
    if b[i] <= b[i+1]:
        a.append(b[i])
    else:
        a.append(b[i+1])

a.append(b[n-2])

print(sum(a))


N = int(input())
B = list(map(int,input().split()))

#A = [0]*N
A = [0]*N

A[0] = B[0]
A[-1] = B[-1]

for i in range(1,N-1):
    A[i] = B[i] - A[i-1]

print(sum(A))

N = 3
B = [2,5,4]

#A = [0]*N
A = [0]*N

A[0] = B[0]

for i in range(1,N-1):

print(sum(A))

N = int(input())
B = list(map(int,input().split()))
#N = 3
#B = [2,5]

A = [0]*N

A[0] = B[0]
A[-1] = B[-1]

for i in range(N-2):
    A[i+1] = B[i] - A[i]

print(sum(A))
